== Acer / Aspire One 753 ==

=== System info ===

'''system-manufacturer''' (dmidecode -s system-manufacturer):
<pre>
Acer
</pre>

'''system-product-name''' (dmidecode -s system-product-name):
<pre>
Aspire One 753
</pre>

'''system-version''' (dmidecode -s system-version):
<pre>
V1.10
</pre>
 X cannot be started except failesafe of rescue mode and audio device cannot be recognized in kernel 2.6.35-22.
But they work well in newer kernel. (I've tested <nowiki>[[http://kernel.ubuntu.com/~kernel-ppa/mainline/v2.6.35.8-maverick/|v2.6.35.8-maverick]]</nowiki> )
